result.execSummary:
One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Grant Daniel Brotzler is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Grant Daniel Brotzler

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan E. Kelly, DF ATTY: Alex Andrea, DF: Grant Daniel Brotzler appeared from jail.  Court called at 2:06 p.m.  Includes case 15CM43, 15CM718, 15CM728, 15CM729, 15CM748, 16CF15 & 16CM175.  Set for STC.  There is an agreement.  Court will take a recess so that they can get permission from Branch 4 to resolve file 15CM43.  Recess at 2:12 p.m.  Case recalled at 2:14 p.m.  Branch 4 does not object to Branch 1 resolving file 15CM43.  Court proceeds with plea/sentencing.  DE has filed a Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights Form with the Court.   Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Ct 1  & Ct. 2 in 15CM729.  Crt reviews the police reports.  Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds the DE adjudicated guilty of Ct 1 & Ct. 2 in 15CM729. On motion of the State, Crt reads in and dismisses Ct 1 in 16CF15 for purposes of restitution.  On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 2-6 in 16CF15 & 15CM43, 15CM718, 15CM728, 15CM748 & 16CM175. Sentencing arguments.  DE makes statement. Crt orders:

Ct. 1 & Ct. 2 to run concurrent 
DE sentenced to 30 days in the St. Croix County Jail
- 5 days credit for time served
- Court grants a Furlough on March 27th from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.  Court will sign an order for furlough
-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Restitution to be determined within 30 day
- DE to attend MRT
- Ct. 1 court costs of $243.00 and a DNA surcharge of $200.00 apply money on file
- Ct. 2 court costs of $243.00 and a DNA surcharge of $200.00 apply money on file
- DE to meet with the payment clerk to set up a payment plan
- DE to provide a DNA sample to the ST. Croix County Sheriff's Department
- 20 days to appeal

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Megan Kelly, DF ATTY: Alex Andrea, DF: Grant Daniel Brotzler appeared.  Court called at Includes case 15CM43 (Set for Motion Hearing), 15CM718 (RW), 15CM728, 15CM729 & 15CM748.  Attorney Andrea advises close to a global resolution.  Branch 3 will allow Branch 1 to hear 16CF15 for the purposes of the resolution.  Set out for STC.  Court QUASHES THE WARRANT IN 15CM718* Bail is continued.  Court adjourned at 10:55 a.m. lw  Status conference scheduled for March 24, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

**AMENDED**

- DE to participate in AA or NA and make reasonabale efforts to find a sponsor. 

- Report to New Richmond PD every Mon. Wed. and Sat. by 5:00pm for a PBT. 

-Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. Defendant must pay $5.00 fee at time of each UA test with an officer of the same sex. 

-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Mr. & Ms. Lyons or  J.V.L.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

If there is a global resolution this file can be included in the resolution. This file should track the Branch 1.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Matthew Hartung DF ATTY: Alex Andrea DF: Grant Daniel Brotzler appeared from jail. Case called at 9:42. Court has rec'd an amended criminal complaint, there is not right to prelim. hearing on those counts. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. Waives reading.  NG to all 6 misdemeanor counts. Atty. Andrea requests to set on 02-11-2016 when he is scheduled with Branch 1. Speedy trial has been waived.  State to provide discovery within 20 days. Atty. Andrea addresses bond. ADA Hartung responds to a bond modification. Court orders DE to be maintained in custody until 3:00pm today.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Mr. & Ms. Lyons or  J.V.L.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
Defendant appeared via video conferencing from the St Croix County jail.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Megan E. Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Grant Daniel Brotzler appeared from jail via video. Court confirms address. Defendant does not qualify for PD.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. ADA Kelly is requesting $1500.00 CB, Atty Andrea argues. Request speedy prelim.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 21, 2016 at 09:15 am.
